word_mean: 若虫：某些节肢动物(如壁虱)生活史中的一期，介于幼虫和成虫之间
若虫除了个体小、性未成熟和没有翅以外与成虫有些相似。参见naliad

sentence.Network_en: She fled as if she were a startled nymph.
sentence.Network_cn: 她像一个受惊的仙女逃走了.

sentence.Network_en: The nymph continued her flight with his plea half uttered.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的恳求还没有说完,少女已经跑远了.

sentence.Network_en: I used rather to like to fancy her a somewhat quiet and serious, yet fair nymph.
sentence.Network_cn: 我向来比较喜欢把她想象成一个有点文静,一本正经而又美丽的山林女神.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French nimphe, from Latin nympha, from Greek numphē 'nymph, bride'; related to Latin nubere 'be the wife of'

encyclopedia.content: 神话人物 名词 n. [C] 1. 【希神】【罗神】居于山林水泽的仙女，女神 She fled as if she were a startled nymph. 她像一个受惊的仙女逃走了。 2. 【诗】美女；年青女子 3. 蛹动漫人物基本信息 妮姆芙（Nymph) 备注：动漫作品《天降之物》中人物 声优：野水伊织 性别：女 种别：电子战用人造天使β“Nymph” 身高：139cm 体重：29kg角色简介 作品中第二只未确认生物，电子战用人造天使β“Nymph”，名字由来为希腊神话中，居于水

entry.tran: (希腊、罗马神话中居于山林水泽的)仙女
entry.def: In Greek and Roman mythology, nymphs were spirits of nature who appeared as young women.
A nymph is the larva, or young form, of an insect such as a dragonfly.

means.word_mean: 1. (classical mythology) a minor nature goddess usually depicted as a beautiful maiden;

sentences.sentence: "the ancient Greeks believed that nymphs inhabited forests and bodies of water"

means.word_mean: 2. a larva of an insect with incomplete metamorphosis (as the dragonfly or mayfly)
